amendment.description: Amendment provides for the establishment of a FEMA long-term recovery office in Florida for a period of no less than 3 years.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 110-136 to establish a FEMA long-term recovery office in Florida. Three years following enactment, FEMA is required to report to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure to evaluate effectiveness of the recovery office.
